pdesc: Halanote is a full-stack web application developed using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack. It offers a robust note-taking system with advanced features, including user authentication, voice input functionality, and secure data handling through JSON Web Tokens (JWT). Halanote provides a secure user authentication system. Users can register, log in, and log out with their unique credentials. Passwords are hashed and stored securely to protect user dataJSON Web Tokens (JWT) are used for secure authorization. This technique ensures that only authenticated users can access their notes and data, enhancing the privacy and security of the platform.One of the unique features of Halanote is its voice input functionality. Users can dictate their notes, making it a convenient option for those who prefer spoken communication or have accessibility needs.

Tenkiknow is a modern weather application designed to provide users with real-time weather information from around the world. Developed using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack for the front end and powered by Tailwind CSS, Tenkiknow offers an interactive and visually engaging user interface. Notably, it does not rely on a database but fetches weather data directly from a weather API.Tenkiknow retrieves current weather conditions, forecasts, and additional meteorological details for user-specified locations. It ensures that users have access to the latest weather information at their fingertips.Tenkiknow includes a location search feature that enables users to find weather information for specific cities, zip codes, or geographic coordinates. This feature simplifies the process of obtaining weather updates for desired locations.
